title: News: Lineup announced for Unknown 2014
body:
[Unknown Festival](http://www.

unknowncroatia.com/ "Unknown 2014") released tickets for 2014 today as well as announcing their initial lineup, Scottish synthpoppers CHVRCHES and Indie veterans Wild Beasts top the bill. Taking place in a forest by the Adriatic Sea, Unknown is one of many Croatian music festivals gaining popularity for their picturesque locations, eclectic lineups and, of course, cheap-ish booze. The music and arts festival is in its fourth year and is run by the people behind [HideoutFestival](http://www.hideoutfestival.com/), [The Warehouse Project](http://www.thewarehouseproject.com/) and [Field Day](http://www.fielddayfestivals.com/). Check out the lineup so far below and find out more from [the official website](http://www.unknowncroatia.com/). ### LIVE CHVRCHES / WILD BEASTS JUNGLE / MOUNT KIMBIE FOREST SWORDS / HENRIK SCHWARZ / JAMES HOLDEN KINK / LAPALUX / TEN WALLS #### DJ ÂME / BICEP / DANIEL AVERY / DIXON / DJ HARVEY / DUSKY EROL ALKAN / GEORGE FITZGERALD / GERD JANSON / JACKMASTER / JOHN TALABOT JOY ORBISON / KIM ANN FOXMAN / MANO LE TOUGH / MICHAEL MAYER / OPTIMO RUB N TUG / RYAN ELLIOTT / SETH TROXLER / SIMIAN MOBILE DISCO / TALE OF US THE 2 BEARS / TOTALLY ENORMOUS EXTINCT DINOSAURS / WAZE & ODYSSEY
